positions.subtitle: Stride Ventures
positions.description: Stride Ventures is a venture debt fund with over $600M deployed across Asia. With presence in India, Abu Dhabi, Singapore, and London, Stride Ventures supports high-growth companies across diverse sectors.Portfolio Companies: Bluestone, Curefoods, Udaan, Slice, Ather Energy, Newme, Sweet Karam Coffee, Drinkprime, Proactive for Her, Koskii, Supertails, Streambox
positions.title: Investment Associate
positions.description_html:
Stride Ventures is a venture debt fund with over $600M deployed across Asia. With presence in India, Abu Dhabi, Singapore, and London, Stride Ventures supports high-growth companies across diverse sectors.


Portfolio Companies:
Bluestone, Curefoods, Udaan, Slice, Ather Energy, Newme, Sweet Karam Coffee, Drinkprime, Proactive for Her, Koskii, Supertails, Streambox

experience.title: Summer Intern
experience.description: Antler is a global early-stage venture capital firm that invests in the defining technology companies of tomorrow. Founded in Singapore in 2017, Antler is on a mission to fundamentally improve the world by enabling and investing in the world's most exceptional people building the defining companies of tomorrow. Antler has already invested in and helped build over 400 companies since launch.Are you building or scaling your startup? Please apply at  and we'll get in touch soon! If you have any queries, feel free to reach out to me at shannath.kumar@antler.co

experience.title: Event Head

experience.title: Intern
experience.description: • Identified 8 commodities (accounting for ~61% of the total imports in 2019-20) and chalked out an Import Substitution Plan; proposed to build domestic competencies and drafted long-term actionables• Assessed infrastructural gaps between status quo and desired targets; forecasted the future investment which will impact 2M+ youths of Northeast India

experience.title: Research Associate
experience.description: ASAR is a student-led organisation aimed at democratising knowledge and resources. It is an initiative to create a network of students, professors and industry leaders which will facilitate student research and strengthen the base for research in India. • Authored an analytical report on ‘Mortgage Industry during Covid 19’; analyzing the past and new trends emerged during pandemic

experience.title: Junior Executive Member
experience.description: CDF is a national-level NPO fostering the spirit of social entrepreneurship to empower the underprivileged • Selected out of 600+ applicants to work on social entrepreneurship models in the domains of education, hygiene, floral waste management, art & culture• Partnered with BYJUs to provide 100+ underprivileged kids in the age group of 6 to 15 with complete access to their content for 3+ subjects• Raised a sum of Rs. 35,00,000, to fund the set-up of the oxygen plant, through CSR donations, philanthropic contribution and individual grants

volunteer_experience.info: Project Aarogya provides rural women with an affordable access to sanitary napkins by establishing a direct supply-chain via local-level village entrepreneurs. Cumulatively impacted 51,350+ lives in 34 areas across 9 states and creating 14 women entrepreneurs; Generated a revenue of Rs. 6,28,732 by selling 2,47,000+ napkins; achieved a 400% YoY growth rate leading to a 190% monthly income increment of entrepreneurs.
volunteer_experience.subtitle: Project Aarogya
volunteer_experience.title: Member

projects: [{"title":"Aarogya","start_date":"Jan 2021","end_date":"Jul 2021","description":"Project Aarogya provides rural women with an affordable access to sanitary napkins by establishing a direct supply-chain via local-level village entrepreneurs"},{"title":"Arpan","start_date":"Jan 2021","end_date":"Jul 2021","description":"Solving the problem of micro level pollution by producing flower based incense sticks handrolled by the specially abled and rural women thereby improving their socio-economic condition and creating a two-fold impact."},{"title":"Dream Library","start_date":"Jan 2021","end_date":"Jul 2021","description":"Setting up libraries with books and e-resources for underprivileged children to make sure their fundamental right to education is fulfilled."},{"title":"Rivayaat","start_date":"Jan 2021","end_date":"Jul 2021","description":"Rivaayat is an initiative to revive and sustain the age-old art forms of India by empowering artisans and making them entrepreneurs by direct market linkages and collaborations with professional designers to create modern utility."}]
